result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: Domestic Abuse - Infliction of Physical Pain or Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marquis L Sims

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marquis L Sims in court with attorney Joseph P Bastien.  Defendant Marquis L Sims in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Hearing held via Zoom. For reasons stated and on State's motion, Court orders case dismissed.

Attorney Joseph P Bastien in court, defendant Marquis L Sims not in court, in custody.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for status. Defendant's appearance waived for today's proceedings. Discussion held as to posture of the case. Court advised competency was raised in defendant's other pending cases. 
Court orders an evaluation be done and orders case set for a return on doctor's report. 
Case adjourned back to Br 30. Court will authorize transferto Br 02 or 34, if accepted.  Doctor's Report Return scheduled for July 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Marquis L Sims
Current: 9346 W Birch Ave, Milwaukee, WI 53225   (Effective: 05-20-2022)
Prior: 9346 West Birch Avenue #3, Milwaukee, WI 53225

Defendant Marquis L Sims in court with attorney Joseph P Bastien.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquis L Sims appeared by video means with Attorney.
Case in court for status conference.  Defense is requesting adjourned status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 30. Status Conference is scheduled on June 28, 2022 at 8:30am.

Justice Point Discharge Report, filed. 
Defendant is in bench warrant status. Court takes no further action at this time.
Status conference on May 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Marquis L Sims in court.  Samantha Raygo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquis L Sims appeared by video means.  
Case in court for pretrial conference. SPD need more time to appoint counsel on this case. Case remains calendared in Br. 30. Status Conference is scheduled on May 19, 2022 at 01:30pm.
Justice Point Violation (New Criminal Charges) Report received and filed.
Justice Point Violation (New Criminal Charges) Report received and filed.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Violation Report received and forwarded to Judge for review.
No Contact Order signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no violent contact with M.L.B.  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Marquis L Sims in court with attorney Robert J Hampton.  Defendant Marquis L Sims in custody.  Matthew James Torbenson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Marquis L Sims appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 19, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
